name: Geoff Webb
content: Geoff Webb - Monash University Geoff Webb public CV View Scopus Profile Geoff Webb Professor Professor (Research), Department of Data Science & AI https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9963-5169 EmailGeoff.Webbmonashedu 1988 …2025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyGeoff Webb is an Australian Laureate Fellow. A leading data scientist and AI researcher, he is the only Australian to have been Program Committee Chair of the two leading Data Mining conferences, ACM SIGKDD and IEEE ICDM. He was elevated to IEEE Fellow in 2015 and his numerous awards include the inaugural Eureka Prize for Excellence in Data Science (2017). He was editor in chief of Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery from 2005 to 2014. He is a Technical Advisor to BigML Inc, who have incorporated his best of class association discovery software, Magnum Opus, as a core component of their cloud-based Machine Learning service. He developed many of the key mechanisms of support-confidence association discovery in the 1980s. His OPUS search algorithm remains the state-of-the-art in rule search. He pioneered multiple research areas as diverse as black-box user modelling, interactive data analytics and statistically-sound pattern discovery. He has developed many useful machine learning algorithms that are widely deployed. Research interestsProfessor Webb conducts research in both fundamnetal and translational artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science. His fundamental research encompasses: Scalable learning of time series classifiers.  more Learning From Non-Stationary Distributions.  moreAssociation Discovery. moreScalable learning of Graphical Models.  moreEarth Observation Analytics. moreCombining Generative and Discriminative Learning.  moreBayesian Machine Learning.  moreEnsemble Machine Learning.  moreInteractive Machine Learning.  moreDecision tree grafting.  moreRule learning.  moreDiscretization.  moreFeature construction, constructive induction and attribute discovery.  moreStudent and User Modeling.  more His fundamental research encompasses: Computational Biology.  moreHealth.  moreEngineering.  moreSupervision interestsOpportunities exists for outstanding Computer Science research candidates to undertake a PhD in the areas of Machine Learning and Data Mining under my supervision. For an indication of potential areas of research see my Research Programs. For application procedures see here. Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
